ns2:test-suite.name: Withdraw from ZED balance by logging in with magic link

test-case.name: Open ZedRun page and input valid email to generate magic link

test-case.name: Check that avatar is shown then click on Wallet

test-case.name: Click on Withdraw button and check if ZED balance is updated
test-case.title: Click on Withdraw button and check if ZED balance is updated
